sub_title: Enterprise Sales Manager Belgium at LinkedIn
summary:
I'm an enthusiastic hands-on dreamer with a strong passion for people & the disruptive role of technology. I'm convinced I will become 100 years old and will have to work until my 70th birthday. I'm only in the beginning of my career but had already to opportunity to work in great companies with super amazing people.

I would summarize my personality in 2 quotes of great leaders: 

- "It always seems impossible until it's done." - N. Mandela
-"Success consists of going from failure to failure without loss of enthusiasm." - W. Churchill
